name: danscarlot
description: CarLot Manager - Cloudflare Workers + Agents for car dealership management

scripts.cf:kv:create: wrangler kv:namespace create INTEGRATIONS_KV && wrangler kv:namespace create AUTH_KV
scripts.cf:kv:preview: wrangler kv:namespace create INTEGRATIONS_KV --preview && wrangler kv:namespace create AUTH_KV --preview
